pages.text: These big-winged dragons can be found flying around and roaring at each other in mountain biomes. Tamed Alpine dragons can be mounted and are able to fly.

pages.title: Taming
pages.text: They really love honey and pollen. a Bee carrying pollen wil be needed to tame them. Take the bee to the Alpine using a lead. Atfer devouring the sweet and protein-packed snack, the Alpine dragon will be yours.

pages.title: Attack
pages.text: Players are able to command their Alpines to send a blast of wind at their foes.

pages.title: Food
pages.text: Alpines can be healed with honey. So no more bee lives need to be sacrificed.
